title: Mount Rushmore National Memorial: Going Green for Kids
body: Going Green for Kids       Our home, the Earth, is undergoing many changes like the greenhouse effect, climate change and global warming. To learn more about these topics and what you can do to help, visit the Student's Guide to Global Climate Change. For more fun learning about taking care of our environment, visit the Students section of the Environmental Protection Agency web page. Download a brochure (1.49 MB PDF) to learn more about how climate changes will affect our national parks.  Download a word search (45 KB PDF). Need help? You can download the answers (46 KB PDF) as well.
